about.title: About Lixin Vietnam
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in accounting and consulting
about.history_text: Founded in 2019 in Tay Ninh, Lixin Vietnam specializes in accounting services, tax consulting and business management. With experienced Vietnamese-Chinese experts, we deliver comprehensive solutions for all businesses.
about.mission_text: Partnering with Vietnamese enterprises and foreign-invested companies, providing professional, transparent and efficient accounting and tax services.
about.vision_text: Becoming the leading accounting and tax consulting firm in Southeast Asia, connecting Vietnamese and Chinese businesses.
about.value_1_text: Adhering to international accounting standards with systematic processes
about.value_2_text: Committed to honesty and clarity in all transactions and reports
about.value_3_text: Always putting client interests first with 24/7 support
